recipesJson.name: Eye of the Tiger
recipesJson.author: MrJwp08
recipesJson.description: Aiming to hit that awsome kellogs frosties taste, and I feel I have succesfully done it! A definate ADV for those cereal lovers!! It's GRRREEEEEAAAATTT

reviews.text: This was pretty good, but it was a bit too sweet for my taste. I may mix this again and drop the CAP SS to .25 or remove it completely. I will be sure to update my review at that point, because other than the overbearing sweetness, this was really good.
Had to use fw crunch cereal instead of cap but really good recipe! Very tasty indeed!!
ADV and currently one of my most vaped! Love it
Spot on! Thank you for this awesome recipe!
ok this stuff is awesome sooooo damn good a job very well done ( claps loudly )
My husband vapes this all day long.
Holy shit they're Greeeeaaaaaat is an understatement.  Best, most on point, cereal vape I've ever had!  Nice job!
Mixing this once again! That's how I know I really enjoy a good vape. The sweet milky notes, and frosted flake grainyness!!

This is a perfect frosted flakes cereal. Spot on. Shake and Vape it's amazing and a week later it's amazing. Im glad I made a 100ml before trying it because a week later and the bottle is empty. This is a great example of what cap cereal 27 can do a recipe adding corn flake flavor and crunch. Great job, thank you. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
I made this yesterday, even without a steep it is tremendous. I've personally never had a more on point cereal vape.
